channel.title: Run Error, Rep ++ if you can tell me where/how to fix
channel.description:
Error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: XPP3 pull parser library not pres ent. Specify another driver. For example: new XStream(new DomDriver()) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.loadLibrary(XppDriver.java: 27) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :14) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :19) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) at server.util.XStreamLibrary.load(XStreamLibrary.java:39) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:38) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:152) [/code] Also this error, repeats when I run the client, over and over and keeps spamming.
I've found the error, and now I get this. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstr eam/XStream at server.util.XStreamLibrary.<clinit>(XStreamLibrary.java:25) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:86) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:154) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:423) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:356) ... 3 more Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Run Error, Rep ++ if you can tell me where/how to fix
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

jaruanna:

You need to add the XPP3 library to your path. http://www.extreme.indiana.edu/xgws/xsoap/xpp/mxp1/index.html

I downloaded it what do i do now?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error, Rep ++ if you can tell me where/how to fix
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Not sure exactly what it is, but what I would try doing is checking the following places, especially if you have changed any of these files recently.

XppDriver.java Lines 27, 14, and 19
XStream.java Line 497
XStreamLibrary.java Line 39
ItemHandler.java Line 38
Server.java Line 152

(It’s most likely to be the ItemHandler.java or Server.java)

If you haven’t changed any of those, I’d go back to whatever you had changed before the last compile and see if you can’t find an error in what you wrote.

Read full topic
item.source: Run Error, Rep ++ if you can tell me where/how to fix

item.title: Run Error, Rep ++ if you can tell me where/how to fix
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: XPP3 pull parser library not pres ent. Specify another driver. For example: new XStream(new DomDriver()) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.loadLibrary(XppDriver.java: 27) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :14) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :19) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) at server.util.XStreamLibrary.load(XStreamLibrary.java:39) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:38) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:152)
Also this error, repeats when I run the client, over and over and keeps spamming.

I’ve found the error, and now I get this.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstr
eam/XStream
        at server.util.XStreamLibrary.<clinit>(XStreamLibrary.java:25)
        at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:86)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:154)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:423)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:356)
        ... 3 more
Press any key to continue . . .
